data.description: Interface to the Yahoo!Messenger IM protocol
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Net::YahooMessenger is Pure Perl module. I think that it does not
    compete, although a module which used as the base libyahoo.c which
    GtkYahoo uses and which is called 'Net::Messenger::Yahoo' is
    distributed
